message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this good deal while you still can.
Alice, my turn. Let's be pragmatic. This offer benefits us both.
The tables have turned, Bob. This is your last chance for a decent deal!
Alice, time is running out. This is my final offer. Let's end this rationally.
Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain. Let's split it down the middle and end this.
